The Fall of the Berlin Wall.德国柏林发生了一件大事: A big event happened in Berlin, Germany
The Fall of the Berlin Wall.柏林墙将东柏林和西柏林分隔开来: The Berlin Wall separates East and West Berlin

The Fall of the Berlin Wall.这是一个物理和意识形态的障碍: This is a physical and ideological barrier

The Fall of the Berlin Wall.柏林墙的倒塌标志着冷战结束的开始和德国的最终统一: The fall of the Berlin Wall marked the beginning of the end of the Cold War and the final reunification of Germany
The Fall of the Berlin Wall.这证明了人们团结起来打破障碍: It's a testament to people coming together to break down barriers

The Silk Road.宝石和异国情调的纺织品等货物: goods such as gemstones and exotic textiles

The Silk Road.随着丝绸之路的蓬勃发展: With the vigorous development of the Silk Road

The Silk Road.尽管面临恶劣地形和不可预测的天气的挑战: Despite the challenges of harsh terrain and unpredictable weather

The Great Wall of China.它经受住了时间的考验: It has stood the test of time
